about.text:
I'm a Teacher and a Quick Learner.
 With enough preparation time, I can learn and teach anything.

services.title: Teaching
services.description: Computer Science Teacher for Grade 9 and 10 at St. Paul Steiner School. Focus on fundamentals of programming and computer science concepts.

services.title: Tutoring
services.description: Private tutor for A Level Computer Science, Mathematics, and Physics. Experienced in helping students achieve their academic goals.

services.title: Learning
services.description: Currently expanding knowledge in Web Development using MERN stack and exploring Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning.

items.title: Fast Learning
items.description: Can quickly grasp new concepts and skills. Also, I have a strong desire to learn and improve.

items.title: Communication
items.description: Have effectively exchanged information clearly and concisely.

items.title: Teamwork
items.description: Have worked collaboratively with others to achieve common goals.

items.title: Planning and Organizing
items.description: Can efficiently plan and organize tasks and projects.
